thread.title: Hillary Clinton burns Michael Flynn over resignation with 'fake news' tweet
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton burns Michael Flynn over resignation with 'fake news' tweet

author: Mark Molloy
title: Hillary Clinton burns Michael Flynn over resignation with 'fake news' tweet
text:
Hillary Clinton burns Michael Flynn over resignation with 'fake news' tweet Hillary Clinton has responded to Michael Flynn's resignation Credit: AFP / Getty Mark Molloy  11am 
H illary Clinton has rubbed salt into the wounds of Michael Flynn following his resignation with a tweet about “the real consequences of fake news”. 
The one-time Democratic presidential candidate shared a tweet from her former aide Philippe Reines on Donald Trump’s national security adviser leaving his post over contacts with Russian officials . 
She shared the tweet, adding: “Philippe's got his own way of saying things, but he has a point about the real consequences of fake news...” Philippe's got his own way of saying things, but he has a point about the real consequences of fake news... https://t.co/a02sXiaHfp — Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) February 14, 2017 Dear Mike Flynn & Mike Flynn Jr.,What goes around COMETS around.And given your pizza obsession... https://t.co/rmyO7wyJKX xo — Philippe Reines (@PhilippeReines) February 14, 2017 
R eines linked to a Domino’s Pizza job advert and posted the message: “Dear Mike Flynn & Mike Flynn Jr. What goes around COMETS around. And given your pizza obsession...” Watch | Michael Flynn resigns as Donald Trump's national security adviser 00:39 
Flynn Jr. lost his job as a Trump aide after tweeting: “Until #Pizzagate proven to be false, it’ll remain a story.” Michael Flynn has resigned Credit: Getty 
H is father resigned after less than a month in office after reports that he had misled Vice-President Mike Pence about his contact with Russia. 
In a resignation letter, Flynn said he gave Pence and others "incomplete information" about his calls with Russia's ambassador to the US.
